segments.text: I said it â€™ s a lovely day . Why don't we go for a walk ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I feel a little tired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then can you wait a few minutes ? I want to finish writing this letter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope it won't be too long . It would be a shame not to take advantage of such lovely weather .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It won't be long . No more than ten minutes . Why don't you go ahead and I'll meet you in the park ?
segments.speaker: S1
